The bot is on speed 🚬 #buildinpublic Update 02: Excited to share our latest progress on Super Fun Social! We've just added a bot to our match3 game, Token Smash, to enhance the multiplayer experience. In early-stage multiplayer games, finding an opponent on the same server can be challenging. Our new bot solves this by identifying possible swaps and making moves from the server side, ensuring that players always have a worthy opponent to play against. This bot also allows players to continue the game if their opponent gets disconnected. Next in Pipeline For Token Smash: - Make bot moves more random and with delays to mimic human moves - Special Powers Stay tuned for more updates! Tags: #SuperFunSocial #Game

Visit our blog now! 📚 #Bingo #OnlineBingo #Gaming #CasualGaming #DigitalAge

🚀 Exciting Announcement! Introducing our latest project: The Hangman Game 🎮 We are thrilled to unveil our newest creation, the Hangman Game! 🌟 🔍 What is the Hangman Game? The Hangman Game is a classic word-guessing game that challenges players to guess a hidden word letter by letter. With its intuitive interface and engaging gameplay, it offers hours of fun and entertainment for players of all ages. 🎯 Key Features: ✅ Dynamic Hangman Image: Watch as the Hangman's fate unfolds with each incorrect guess. ✅ Hint System: Need a little help? Take advantage of hints to guide you through the game. ✅ Play Again Option: Can't get enough? Simply hit the "Play Again" button for endless entertainment. 🤔 Why Play the Hangman Game? Sharpen your vocabulary skills Exercise your problem-solving abilities Enjoy a nostalgic gaming experience Don't miss out on the fun – play the Hangman Game now! 💬 #HangmanGame #WordGame #Gaming #Fun #Entertainment #ChallengeAccepted

⚔ Omni Creator Products' Project Frontier is starting playtests! ⚔ We truly believe in fostering a strong bond between players and the developers who create the games they love. That's why we, a bunch of goofy developers with experience in games like Roblox and Fortnite, have come together. Our game, Project Frontier, is a cooperative action-adventure RPG where you and your friends can explore, strategize, and survive together. The exciting twist is that modding will be seamlessly integrated into the gameplay! We’re thrilled to announce our first official round of limited playtests happening 10/20-10/22! Here’s the details on how to sign up: 1️⃣ Fill out the following Google Form: https://lnkd.in/gmQf7PYR 2️⃣ Create an account over at https://playtest.ocp.gg We hope to see you on the Frontier soon! #projectfrontier #rpg #fantasy #gamedev #UnrealEngine5

📣 Shout out to #gamedevelopers in my network (and #gamers too)... come and tell us how to make our game better and maybe win some prizes. 💸 We (Red Rover Interactive) have been running open playtests of Coltrane (a very early version of our new game) for a few months now and have found feedback we get from game developers in our community is particularly valuable sooo... we'd like to get as many of you good people as possible to join our next one. We ran a content creator competition at the end of 2023 which was well received by the streamers involved and gave us some great feedback and we're going to use the same format again. This means a winner takes all competition with a prize for whoever controls the train (our game world) at the end of a 3h session. The mayhem will happen on Sat 10th Feb, more info here: https://lnkd.in/drNgXY_Y You'll need Discord to sign up, Steam to download and decent gaming spec PC to play. Discord Link here: https://lnkd.in/ddA7NFCT Steam Link here: https://lnkd.in/dtHXXXcC Lastly this is large scale multiplayer PvP so you're more likely to win if you rope in a few friends. Any questions just shout 😁

The Game7 portal is getting bigger and better! We’ve teamed up with Mantle Network to add five new dungeons for gamers to conquer in our latest questing campaign, Dungeons & Degens. Each of these games is already live on the Mantle chain. Inspired by Dungeons & Dragons, Dungeons & Degens empowers players to explore new horizons and claim their place in the games they love. This partnership will add Metacene, Catizen, Party Icons, Atman, and Uldor to the already extensive list of Web3 gaming communities contributing to this experience. D&D addresses two major challenges in Web3 gaming: Onboarding new users and keeping them engaged. The Game7 portal offers gamified user acquisition, player engagement, and player retention primitive inspired by the most popular MMORPG mechanics, which include progression systems, equipable items, crafting, and player reputation. We are changing the Web3 Gaming Experience. Try it out for yourself at https://app.game7.io/. #gamingnews #gamingindustry #web3gaming #web3news
